title: 65. Enmeshment & Your Relationships (Part 4 of the Reparenting Series)
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are concluding the reparenting series with part 4 of the series on the topic of Enmeshment. Enmeshment happens when we struggle to distinguish between who we are and who other people are. Oftentimes, this happens with our parents and our families. When this happens, it makes it difficult for us to know and realize our own identity & desires. Tune in to this episode for more!

Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!

(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)
